original_text: (That too was considered a land of the Rephaites, who used to live there; but the Ammonites called them Zamzummites.
korean_text: (이곳도 르바임의 땅이라 하였나니 전에 르바임이 거기 거주하였음이요 암몬 족속은 그들을 삼숨밈이라 일컬었으며

sentences.original_text: That too was considered a land of the Rephaites
but the Ammonites called them Zamzummites
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 암몬 사람들은 그들을 잠음 사람이라 불렀다
